data.title: Lithium Thionyl Chloride
data.text:
Lithium Thionyl Chloride batteries are widely used in various industries for their high energy density, long shelf life, and excellent performance in extreme temperatures. They are commonly used in applications that require long-lasting and reliable power, such as military equipment, medical devices, and industrial sensors.

In this article, we will explore Lithium Thionyl Chloride batteries in more detail and focus on the Blue Sleeve brand's offerings. We will discuss the different models of Lithium Thionyl Chloride batteries offered by the Blue Sleeve brand, their features, and their applications.

Overview of Lithium Thionyl Chloride Batteries

Lithium Thionyl Chloride batteries are primary batteries, which means they are non-rechargeable. They are composed of a Lithium metal anode and a cathode made of Thionyl Chloride (SOCl2) liquid electrolyte. This combination creates a high energy density, which allows these batteries to last longer than most other battery types. They also have a long shelf life of up to 20 years, making them an ideal choice for applications that require infrequent battery replacement.

These batteries have a wide operating temperature range, from -55°C to +85°C, making them suitable for use in extreme environments. They are also resistant to shock and vibration, making them ideal for use in applications that require reliable performance in harsh conditions.

Different Models of Lithium Thionyl Chloride Batteries Offered by Blue Sleeve

Blue Sleeve is a well-known brand in the battery industry, offering a range of high-quality Lithium Thionyl Chloride batteries. The following are some of the Lithium Thionyl Chloride batteries offered by the Blue Sleeve brand.

3.6 Volt 2/3 AA 1650 mAh Primary Lithium Battery with Tabs (ER14335)

The ER14335 is a 2/3 AA size Lithium Thionyl Chloride battery with tabs, offering a nominal voltage of 3.6 volts and a capacity of 1650 mAh. This battery is designed to provide long-lasting and reliable power for applications such as alarm systems, remote monitoring systems, and wireless devices.

The tabs on this battery make it easy to install and connect to devices. The ER14335 has a low self-discharge rate, making it an ideal choice for applications that require infrequent battery replacement.

3.6 Volt ER14335 2/3 AA Primary Lithium Battery (1650 mAh)

The ER14335 is also available without tabs, making it a great option for applications that do not require tabs for installation. It offers a nominal voltage of 3.6 volts and a capacity of 1650 mAh, providing long-lasting power for devices such as memory backup, remote controls, and medical devices.

The ER14335 has a high energy density and a low self-discharge rate, making it an ideal choice for applications that require a long shelf life.

3.6 Volt ER14505 AA Primary Lithium Battery (2700 mAh)

The ER14505 is an AA size Lithium Thionyl Chloride battery with a nominal voltage of 3.6 volts and a capacity of 2700 mAh. It is designed to provide long-lasting and reliable power for applications such as wireless communication devices, data loggers, and portable instruments.

The ER14505 has a high energy density and a low self-discharge rate, making it an ideal choice for applications that require a long shelf life.

The ER14250 (LS14250) has a high energy density and a low self-discharge rate, making it an ideal choice for applications that require a long shelf life. Its compact size makes it suitable for use in small devices.

3.6 Volt 1/2 AA 1200 mAh Primary Lithium Battery with Tabs (LS14250 & ER14250)

The 1/2 AA size Lithium Thionyl Chloride battery with tabs is available in the LS14250 and ER14250 models, offering a nominal voltage of 3.6 volts and a capacity of 1200 mAh. It is designed to provide long-lasting and reliable power for applications such as security systems, remote monitoring systems, and wireless devices.

The tabs on this battery make it easy to install and connect to devices. The 3.6 Volt 1/2 AA 1200 mAh Primary Lithium Battery with Tabs (LS14250 & ER14250) has a low self-discharge rate, making it an ideal choice for applications that require infrequent battery replacement.

LS14250 (ER14250) 3.6 Volt 1/2 AA Primary Lithium Battery with Leads (1200 mAh)

The LS14250 (ER14250) 3.6 Volt 1/2 AA Primary Lithium Battery with Leads is a compact battery designed for use in small devices. It offers a nominal voltage of 3.6 volts and a capacity of 1200 mAh, providing long-lasting and reliable power for applications such as security systems, remote monitoring systems, and wireless devices.

The leads on this battery make it easy to install and connect to devices. The LS14250 (ER14250) has a low self-discharge rate, making it an ideal choice for applications that require infrequent battery replacement.

3.6 Volt ER18505 Primary Lithium Battery (3600 mAh)

The ER18505 is a Lithium Thionyl Chloride battery with a cylindrical shape, offering a nominal voltage of 3.6 volts and a capacity of 3600 mAh. It is designed to provide long-lasting and reliable power for applications such as water meters, gas meters, and industrial controllers.

The ER18505 has a high energy density and a low self-discharge rate, making it an ideal choice for applications that require a long shelf life. Its cylindrical shape makes it suitable for use in devices with limited space.

C (LS26500 / ER26500) 3.6 Volt Primary Lithium Battery with Tabs

The C size Lithium Thionyl Chloride battery with tabs is available in the LS26500 and ER26500 models, offering a nominal voltage of 3.6 volts and a capacity of 9000 mAh. It is designed to provide long-lasting and reliable power for applications such as remote controls, portable instruments, and wireless communication devices.

The tabs on this battery make it easy to install and connect to devices. The C (LS26500 / ER26500) has a low self-discharge rate, making it an ideal choice for applications that require infrequent battery replacement.

C LS26500 (ER26500) 3.6 Volt Primary Lithium Battery (9000 mAh)

The C size Lithium Thionyl Chloride battery without tabs is available in the LS26500 and ER26500 models, offering a nominal voltage of 3.6 volts and a capacity of 9000 mAh. It is designed to provide long-lasting and reliable power for applications such as remote controls, portable instruments, and wireless communication devices.

The C LS26500 (ER26500) has a high energy density and a low self-discharge rate, making it an ideal choice for applications that require a long shelf life. Its cylindrical shape makes it suitable for use in devices with limited space.

3.6 Volt ER34615 (SAFT LSH20) D Primary Lithium Battery (19000 mAh)

The ER34615 (SAFT LSH20) is a D size Lithium Thionyl Chloride battery, offering a nominal voltage of 3.6 volts and a capacity of 19000 mAh. It is designed to provide long-lasting and reliable power for applications such as electronic meters, data loggers, and military equipment.

The ER34615 (SAFT LSH20) has a high energy density and a low self-discharge rate, making it an ideal choice for applications that require a long shelf life. Its large size provides a high capacity, making it suitable for use in devices that require a high amount of power.

D (ER34615 / SAFT LSH20) 3.6 Volt Primary Lithium Battery with Tabs (19000 mAh)

The D size Lithium Thionyl Chloride battery with tabs is available in the ER34615 and SAFT LSH20 models, offering a nominal voltage of 3.6 volts and a capacity of 19000 mAh. It is designed to provide long-lasting and reliable power for applications such as electronic meters, data loggers, and military equipment.

The tabs on this battery make it easy to install and connect to devices. The D (ER34615 / SAFT LSH20) has a low self-discharge rate, making it an ideal choice for applications that require infrequent battery replacement.

16 x ER14250 (LS14250) 1/2 AA 3.6 Volt Primary Lithium Battery (1200 mAh)

The ER14250 (LS14250) 1/2 AA size Lithium Thionyl Chloride battery is available in a pack of 16, offering a nominal voltage of 3.6 volts and a capacity of 1200 mAh per battery. It is designed to provide long-lasting and reliable power for applications such as remote controls, memory backup, and security systems.

The ER14250 (LS14250) has a high energy density and a low self-discharge rate, making it an ideal choice for applications that require a long shelf life. The pack of 16 batteries provides a convenient and cost-effective solution for bulk battery replacement.

Applications of Lithium Thionyl Chloride Batteries

Lithium Thionyl Chloride batteries are used in a wide range of applications that require long-lasting and reliable power. Some of the common applications of Lithium Thionyl Chloride batteries are:

Remote Controls: Lithium Thionyl Chloride batteries are commonly used in remote controls for TVs, DVD players, and other electronic devices.

Security Systems: Lithium Thionyl Chloride batteries are used in security systems for motion sensors, door and window sensors, and other security devices.

Wireless Devices: Lithium Thionyl Chloride batteries are used in wireless communication devices such as pagers, GPS trackers, and wireless sensors.

Portable Instruments: Lithium Thionyl Chloride batteries are used in portable instruments such as data loggers, temperature sensors, and humidity sensors.

Medical Devices: Lithium Thionyl Chloride batteries are used in medical devices such as glucose meters, pulse oximeters, and defibrillators.

Military Equipment: Lithium Thionyl Chloride batteries are used in military equipment such as communication devices, electronic meters, and night vision goggles.

Industrial Sensors: Lithium Thionyl Chloride batteries are used in industrial sensors such as flow meters, pressure sensors, and gas detectors.

Lithium Thionyl Chloride batteries are an excellent choice for applications that require long-lasting and reliable power. They have a high energy density, long shelf life, and excellent performance in extreme temperatures. The Blue Sleeve brand offers a range of high-quality Lithium Thionyl Chloride batteries in various sizes and capacities, making it easy to find the right battery for your application.

Whether you need a battery for remote controls, security systems, wireless devices, portable instruments, medical devices, military equipment, or industrial sensors, the Blue Sleeve brand has a Lithium Thionyl Chloride battery to meet your needs. With their high energy density and long shelf life, these batteries provide a cost-effective and reliable solution for your power needs.
